column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////A fun place to go and have deep dish Chicago style pizza with lots of baseball memorabilia on the walls- not just Sox's & Cubs. The Lou and Classic pies are nice as we say in Jersey. The fried calamari is good
column2: not too much oil and tastes fresh. Some say you need to try the thin crust pies. I would agree
column3: but if you are not frequenting Chicago then you have to go with the deep dish.
